seo.title: Conversion-Focused Websites for Small Businesses | Metis Web Agency
seo.description: We design and develop fast, clear websites built to generate enquiries: structure, copy, technical SEO, Core Web Vitals, and GA4/GTM key events to turn visits into leads.

content.title:
A website shouldn’t just look good.
It must help people find you and send real enquiries.
content.subtitle: We build solid foundations: clear message, essential pages, performance and clean tracking.
content.body: We start from goals and audience, then turn strategy into a fast, credible website: structure, copy, CTA, technical SEO and measurement. The result is an online presence that works even when you’re not there.

content.title:
The goal isn’t “being online”.
It’s being chosen.
content.subtitle: A strong website does three things: explain, guide, convert.
content.body: When a website doesn’t generate leads, it’s usually one (or more) of these: unclear message, too many useless pages, weak CTA, slow performance, or no tracking. We bring clarity and build a simple path: from visit to enquiry.

columns.title: Structure people understand
columns.subtitle: Architecture + essential content
columns.description: We define what pages you truly need (and in what order), with a message aligned to your audience and goals.

columns.title: Performance & technical SEO
columns.subtitle: Speed, accessibility, indexability
columns.description: We optimize Core Web Vitals, metadata, sitemap/robots and technical SEO foundations so you can be found on Google and AI answers.

columns.title: Conversion & tracking
columns.subtitle: CTA, forms, GA4/GTM key events
columns.description: We set up events and key events so you know what works, where you lose leads, and what to improve next.

content.title:
Website first. Then visibility.
Not the other way around.
content.subtitle: If you send traffic to a confusing website, you’re paying to lose opportunities.
content.body: We build message and foundations first. Then we activate SEO and campaigns with clean measurement. That’s how every euro spent has a reason—and you can decide when to scale or adjust.

header.title: We choose the right structure (based on your goal)
header.subtitle: There is no “perfect website”. There is the right website for your case.
header.body: Every solution starts from goals and audience. Here are the most common options—we adapt them to your industry and budget.

items.title: A one-page that converts
items.description: Ideal to start: one strong message, sections in a logical order, proof and clear CTA. Perfect for campaigns and local services.

items.title: Corporate / business website
items.description: For companies and studios: service pages, credible about page, SEO-friendly structure and content designed for qualified enquiries.

items.title: Website for local service businesses
items.description: Built to win local searches: service pages, location intent, fast CTA, tracking and ongoing optimization over time.

items.title: Website + lead capture system
items.description: Forms, basic automation, integrations (CRM, Calendly, WhatsApp), GA4 key events and reporting—so you handle enquiries without chaos.

items.title: Redesign & optimization
items.description: If the website exists but doesn’t work: audit, new content hierarchy, copy, CTA and performance. We fix what matters—not what just “looks nice”.

items.title: Technical SEO & tracking setup
items.description: Indexability cleanup, redirects, sitemap/robots, metadata, GA4/GTM and key events. Essential before investing in Ads.

content.eyebrow: Want to see if it makes sense for you?
